## SCWRF Special Eddition
West Hills has partnered with the Santiam Canyon Wildfire Relief Fund(SCWRF) to bring you this very special wine. These grapes were harvested during the Santiam Canyon Wildfires of 2020 which have left their subtle mark on this Wine. Notes of cherry-cola, white pepper, and just a hint of smoke combine with a pleasant acidity that allows this wine to pair with just about anything.
